tidbits.title: Beach Paradise
tidbits.description: Antigua and Barbuda are renowned for their pristine beaches, with Antigua alone boasting 365 beaches, one for each day of the year, offering a perfect tropical escape.

tidbits.title: Rich History
tidbits.description: With a history influenced by Amerindian, African, and British colonial heritage, Antigua and Barbuda's historical sites like Nelson's Dockyard reflect its diverse past.

tidbits.title: Sailing Capital
tidbits.description: Known as the 'Sailing Capital of the Caribbean,' Antigua hosts prestigious sailing events like Antigua Sailing Week, attracting enthusiasts and professionals worldwide.
